choices: Brandi slips off Chris' sock and massages and caresses his bare foot and toes
Chris kicks off his other shoe and places it near on Brandi's right side
Fred hides Scott's shoes and socks so he has to stay bare foot

1.content:
Chris and Brandi got to class after the bell rang and were being reprimanded by Mr. Ross, the teacher. Fred comes waltzing in about 5 minutes later wearing an Hawaiian shirt with a lei around his neck, baggy shorts and flops on his semi-tan bare feet with slender, pedicured toes.

Mr. Ross shouts "Mr. Meyers, what's with the Hawaiian getup? You know we have a dress code even on free dress day, but I gotta say I love the attire especially the flops on your bare feet". Fred smiles and says "Oh Mr. Ross, I just got ready a little early for the dance in the gym tonight. It's going to be a wild one".
Mr. Ross tells him to take a seat. Another student raises his hand and says "That's not fair Mr. Ross, I got a demerit for wearing the wrong type of socks last week and Fred gets away with wearing that getup and flops on his BARE feet!".
Mr. Ross replies "Well Scott, if you want to go barefoot in class today, go ahead, but just for today! I hope you took a shower after gym class".
Scott rolls his eyes and nods his head saying "Of course I did". Scott begins to kick off his school dress shoes, then peels off his dress socks exposing his semi-pale bare feet with slender, trim toes. He wiggles his toes and lets them stretch out in front of him.

The rest of the class laughs at Scott and Fred. Chris pipes in and tells Scott "You need to get some sun on those pale bare feet of yours. They could sure use it!". Brandi, who sits in front of Chris looks at Scott whispering "Scott, I love your beautiful tan bare feet just the way they are". She looks down at Scott's shoed feet under her desk and brushes her hand against them. Scott replies "Brandi, stop it, our classmates are watching us. You can adore them later".

Mr. Ross informs the class that he will be showing a video to which a small quiz on it will follow saying "Please don't fall asleep and make mental notes of key people and what they say. Becky, can you turn the lights out?". Becky turns the lights off and the video displays on the big white board in front of the class.
Brandi turns around to Chris and says "Now can I play with your feet?". Chris looks at her and smiles saying "Yes, but pay attention to the video too. I can't help you with the quiz afterwards". As the video progresses, Brandi picks up Chris' right foot and places it in her lap and begins to untie the shoe. She carefully slips it off and begins to caress and massage Chris' socked foot as she watches the video. Chris winces a couple times as she massages his foot. As the video continues...
1.title: Free dress day gone wild...

choices: Chris puts his shoes and socks back on and leaves with Brandi
Chris stays barefoot and walks out carrying his shoes & socks in hand
Scott freaks out because his shoes and socks have disappeared
Brandi puts on her beau's shoes and socks back on his feet as Wendy fumes

11.content:
Chris and the rest of the class is watching attentively except for Brandi. She slowly begins to tug off Chris' sock, down past his ankle, past his heel and finally off his toes. Chris feels his sock come off and immediately splays his bare toes. Brandi inserts her fingers between his naked toes and squeezes them. Chris jumps and winces a bit since he has ticklish feet and toes. His concentration is broken as Brandi lifts up his barefoot and nibbles on his big toe, then engulfs it into her mouth. Chris slumps more into his seat.

Just then, the video ends and the lights go up. Brandi quickly takes Chris' toe out of her mouth and his foot from her lap. Chris tries to hide his tan bare foot underneath Brandi's desk, but a few classmates notice his discarded shoe and sock on the floor. Mr. Ross also notices them and walks over and picks them up off the ground and says "Mr. Packard, is this your shoe and sock?" Chris embarrassingly stands up and says "Yes, um I had an itch on my big toe". Mr. Ross looks down at Chris' tan and pedicured, big toe that is still wet with saliva and says "Were you sucking on it Chris? It's wet".
Chris shrugs his shoulders replying "Uh, I have sweaty feet?" as he looks at Brandi. Brandi blows a kiss to him and his bare foot.
Mr. Ross says "Well since you have one foot bare, take off your other shoe and sock and come up here and help me". Chris quickly takes off his other shoe and sock and walks up to the front in his bare feet.

Brandi stares at her boyfriend's bare beauties as he is instructed to lay down on a table with his bare feet hanging slightly over the edge. Mr. Ross takes out a instrument out of his pocket and brushes it against Chris' bare soles and toes. Chris flinches and jerks his feet. "Wow Chris, you do have long slender tan bare feet...and your slender toes..how do you take such good care of them, being an athlete and all?" Mr. Ross says to Chris. Chris replies "My mom owns a nail salon. I get a touch up almost every week".
Brandi pipes in saying "...and they're absolutely exquisite" and smiles.

"Well Chris, can you wiggle your toes as I look at each one? I want to test your foot reflexes and motion skills". Chris complies and wiggles his toes as Mr. Ross takes some notes and touches both of his bare feet all over.
Fred pipes in "I was already barefoot Mr. Ross, why didn't you just pick me?".
Mr. Ross replies "Uh Chris was closer and besides your bare feet are cold to the touch. Remember when I had you strapped in on the backboard and I took off your shoes and socks. Your bare feet were cold to the touch and kinda smelled. Chris' bare feet don't smell and are warm...sorry". Fred sulks and sits down in his seat and glares at Chris.

Later, as the class ends...
11.title: Brandi slips off Chris' sock and massages a...

Chris has to stay overnight as a precaution. Brandi visits him

111.content:
Mr. Ross thanks Chris as he returns to his seat still barefoot.
Brandi whispers to him "I wish you could stay barefoot all day long, you handsome stud!" Chris blushes as he grabs his sock.
Brandi takes it from him and says "Here, allow me my love..." as she slips the sock onto his barefoot. Brandi puts his other sock and both shoes on Chris' feet before the bell rings.
Just then Scott screams and says "Where's my shoes and socks? I can't go to my next class in bare feet". He looks around for them.
Fred laughs and pulls Scott's shoes from underneath his desk and his socks from another desk. Scott quickly grabs them and puts them on his bare feet and runs out. Fred slips on his flops and puts his shirt on and leaves.
Mr. Ross yells out "Fred, no flops or lei tomorrow understand!" Fred yells back in the hall "No problem Mr. R".

Brandi and Chris gather their things and walk out together as Wendy follows behind them. In the hall, Brandi and Chris kiss and part ways. Brandi walks to her locker as Chris runs to his next class in the science wing. Wendy smiles because she has the same class with Chris, but Brandi does not. "Oh Chris, wait for me!" Wendy exclaims making sure Brandi hears her. Brandi and Wendy used to best friends until Chris entered the picture.

A few moments later, Chris and Wendy enter their chemistry class and sit at the same lab station. The sub instructor tells the class to work on their experiment from yesterday and to be careful of the chemicals they use. Wendy smiles and looks at Chris. Chris says "I'll go get the Hydrochloric Acid while you get the glass containers and liquid...okay?" Wendy agrees and begins to set their station up.
Chris comes back with a small glass jar of acid, carrying it with rubber gloves on his hands. He almost makes it back to his seat without an incident when Wendy bumps into him causing part of it to spill on him. "Wendy...ahhh" Chris yells out. "My good pants and shoes are ruined...ahhh its hitting my leg". Chris quickly kicks off his shoes and pulls his pants off to see if any of the acid has spilled on his bare legs. He runs to the emergency shower and rinses off his legs. He bends down and peels off his wet socks and takes off his shirt leaving him clad only his wet boxers.
The instructor calls the nurse's office and 911, then helps Chris wash off the any acid. The other students including Wendy are in awe as Chris panics in the shower with only his wet boxers on him. Since they're wet, his manhood can be easily made out, partially poking out thru the opening slit. The instructor quickly pulls the small curtain around the shower area and pulls off Chris' boxers leaving him naked. "Chris, you have to wash your whole body to make sure the acid isn't on your skin. Wash your feet and legs really well while I get your back!". Chris lifts up his right bare foot and washes it with special soap while the instructor washes his back. "Sorry about pulling your boxers off leaving you naked, but you don't want to take any chances with this stuff". Chris replies "It's okay! Better safe than sorry!" as he washes his other bare foot.

After rinsing off, Chris is handed a towel to dry off and another to put around his waist.
Paramedics arrive and check Chris out from head to toe. He is lucky that there is only a couple slight burn marks on his right leg and the top of his right foot and toes. "You're lucky young man. It could have been a lot worse" the paramedic says to Chris.
Wendy rushes over as Chris is put on a gurney and says "I'm so sorry Chris...(brushes his uninjured foot and toes with her hand), I didn't see you". Chris splays his toes saying in reply "Wendy, don't do that. You know I have ticklish feet".
The paramedics put some special lotion onto Chris' right leg, foot and toes and bandages them up. "We're going to take you to the hospital to have you checked out".
"Okay, what about my clothes?" Chris replies. The other paramedic shows the Chris his acid-eaten shoes and pants. "They're ruined. Lucky you were wearing long pants and socks, otherwise those burns would have been a lot worse". They strap Chris onto the gurney and cover him up with a couple blankets. Chris' left bare toes are partially exposed as he is wheeled out. Chris looks at Wendy and closes his eyes. Wendy picks up Chris' shirt, wet socks and boxers, puts them in a bag and follows the paramedics out to the front of the school. Chris is placed in the ambulance and taken away.

Brandi stays a bit longer, then leaves the room
Wendy hides in the next room until Brandi leaves
1112.content:
Later that afternoon, Chris is laying in a hospital bed sleeping. His right leg and barefoot are bandaged with only his toes exposed. A blanket covers the rest of his body.
Brandi rushes in and leans over him and gives him a big kiss on the cheek. "Oh my poor love. Does it still hurt?". She looks over at his bandages. She continues "At least your beautiful toes didn't get scarred or burned (she pulls back the blanket exposing his other bare foot and toes) and your other foot and cute toes are fine. What happened in class?".
Chris begins to tell her about the whole incident as she caresses his uninjured barefoot and toes.
"...then I had to jump in the shower to wash the acid off my skin. I ended up naked after the teacher pulled off my boxers and told me to use a special soap to scrub my whole body. At least my penis didn't get burned right babe". Brandi smiles and looks underneath the sheet saying "It's still looks great. Can I give him some pleasure?". Chris replies "Oh baby, I'd love it. Sure no one will interrupt us?". Brandi replies "I'll close the curtain and lock the door". Chris smiles as Brandi walks to lock the door and pull the curtain around his bed. Chris meanwhile pulls back the sheet exposing his naked body. Knowing that Brandi is going to give him a blowjob, his penis is already semi-erect. "We're ready!" Chris exclaims.

Wendy walks back and peeks around the curtain and sees Chris laying there completely naked. She begins teasing him by licking his left foot and toes, sucking on his big toe. She then kisses his left leg and she caresses his bare, semi-hairy chest. Brandi makes her way up to his waist and kisses his balls before sticking his penis inside her mouth. Chris leans back, moaning and panting. It doesn't take long for Chris' toes to splay as he explodes into her mouth. "Oh...oh...ughhh, oh Wendy, I'm going to..." screams Chris. Brandi cleans herself up and covers up a relieved Chris just as a doctor and nurse pull the curtain back. The nurse notices Chris' erection underneath his gown and sheet. Doctor shakes Chris saying "Chris, I can see you are feeling a bit better. At least in the penis department that is". Chris replies "Sorry doc! My girl can't keep her hands off me". The nurse pulls back the sheet exposing Chris' bare legs and bare feet. The doctor checks on the bandages. "Chris, you'll be fine. Your leg and foot will be back to normal in a few weeks. It was just a first degree burn. Your teacher is to be commended for stripping all of your clothes off and wash immediately (pulls Chris' gown up, exposing his naked body and penis), otherwise you would have burns all over". He checks Chris' heart beat again, then presses on different areas of his chest, then waist including his flaccid penis. He then checks out both bare legs and bare feet. As the doctor touches Chris' bare toes, Chris flinches. "A little ticklish are you? Your toes, I must say look amazing, in fact, your bare feet are beautiful" the doctor says. "My mom's works in a nail salon. I get them done almost every week or so". The doctor taps his big toe and writes some stuff down on a clipboard.
"Well, just keep them covered for a while when you're outdoors and uncovered while indoors" the doctor exclaims and continues "they need time to heal with no sun, but has some air. Take your shoe and sock off while you are in class and let your barefoot breathe, but put them on when your outside...okay". Brandi pipes in "Oh, I'll make sure he does just that doc".

The doctor and nurse leave as Wendy walks in to visit him. Brandi intercepts her and tells her to leave. From a distance Wendy says to Chris "I just wanted to apologize again for burning you...". Brandi pushes her out and closes the door and says "I hate that bitch. I can't believe she was once my friend". Brandi walks over to Chris and caresses his barefoot and toes again. Chris smiles and says "Oh Brandi, at least she's sorry. At least I can be bare foot in class for a while, while my leg and foot heal. You get to see my bare feet a lot more now...right". Brandi smiles and engulfs his big toe into her mouth and sucks on it. Chris leans back and splays his other toes. "Better not do that to long my love, my penis might explode again" he says to Brandi.
Unknown to both of them, Wendy watches thru the small window in the door. She sees Brandi sucking on Chris' big toe. She then steps away...

Will's friend Preston helps an injured Will to the nurse's office
Chris and Brandi make it back to Chris' house for him to rest
11123.content:
Brandi kisses all of Chris' toes and covers them back up, then kisses him on the cheek again before leaving. "I'll check on you tomorrow. What do you want for breakfast?". Chris replies "A breakfast burrito and an OJ from Jack in the Box" as he leans back. Brandi leaves the room and Chris closes his eyes.
Wendy is seen sneaking in the hospital room with another young boy. They both crawl on the floor toward Chris' bed. Wendy whispers to her friend "Now you know the game plan right Will?". Will replies "Yes, Wendy, you told me a hundred times, but do I really have to suck Chris' big toe?". Wendy replies "Yes, his toe looks perfect and doesn't smell. Do it for me Will and I'll return the favor later" looking at Will with puppy dog eyes.
They get to the foot of the bed and slowly sit up onto their knees. Wendy slowly stands and walks toward Chris' face and covers his eyes with her hand. Chris is startled and thinks it may be Brandi playing with him. "So you came back for some more huh Brandi?" he says. Wendy smiles and kisses his cheek. She looks down at Chris' covered bare feet as Will slowly pulls back the sheet and lightly brushes Chris' bare sole and toes with his hand. Chris' splays his toes in delight.
"Brandi, you definitely have a foot fetish with my bare feet!" Chris says to Wendy (thinking it's still Brandi). Will looks up at Wendy and hesitates to what he has to do next. Wendy glares at him with her eyes.
Will sighs and slowly engulfs Chris' big toe into his mouth and begins to suck on it and swirl his tongue around it. Chris winces and tries to pull Wendy's hand away. Wendy says in soft, whispering voice "Keep your eyes love. I want this to be special tonight". She looks down at Will who seems to be enjoying sucking and nibbling not only on his big toe, but all of his toes and bare sole. "Oh Brandi, you are so wonderf...." Chris says as he falls asleep in bliss. Wendy uncovers his eyes and gives him another kiss on the cheek.
"Okay Will, you can stop pleasuring Chris' bare foot and toes now. Did you hear me?" Wendy says as she looks down at him.
Will doesn't hear her at first. He's busy kissing Chris' toes and sole and top all over.
Wendy pulls him away and says "Enough...let's go!" Will replies "Wow, Chris does have some great tasting and great looking bare feet and those toes of his...". Unknown to Wendy and Will, Will drops his wallet and as he picks it up, his student ID card falls out onto the floor under the bed. Will also forgets to cover Chris' barefoot back up.

The next morning Chris is released after having breakfast brought by his girlfriend. She has also brought him some new clothes and shoes to wear since his other clothes were ruined. As they exit, Brandi notices something shiny under the bed and stoops to pick it up. "What is Will Mastis' ID doing here? He's a friend of Wendy's, but he doesn't really know you Chris...right?. Chris replies "I helped him a couple times with some fitness tests in gym class and mentored him on his math exam. I remember though, he kept on staring at my bare feet in the gym while we did different gym exercises. Coach doesn't allow us to wear shoes or socks. Will also gave me strange looks as I mentored him at my home". Brandi replies "He knows where you live?".
Chris says back to Brandi "Yes, but he came over as I just got home from baseball practice. I had just gotten out of the shower when the doorbell rang. I had to answer it with only a towel around my waist. Will took a double take at my bare feet and then walked in. I did get dressed, but stayed barefoot which made me wonder if he has a foot fetish like you do Brandi". Brandi smiles.
Chris continues "Will had taken his shoes off when he came into the house and later took off his socks saying his feet were warm. His bare feet didn't look all that great though they were tan and hairless, his toes were slender yet gnarly. He needed a pedicure!".
Brandi and Chris leave the hospital room hand in hand.

Meanwhile, Wendy meets up with Will as he arrives at school. He's not wearing the standard school uniform, a green sweater over a white button down shirt, dark slacks and black dress shoes with dark socks. Instead he has on his PE uniform and flops on his bare feet. "Wow, Mr. Ross is going to give you a demerit for sure!" Wendy exclaims. Will replies "No he won't, I have gym class right before his class. I'm barefoot since coach won't allow shoes or socks on the mats and other equipment. Thanks though for giving my poor bare feet a pedicure. They were nasty and now look great!". Will wiggles his slender tan, pedicured toes at Wendy.
"It was the least I could do after seeing you barefoot last week and seeing those gnarly toes of yours. Didn't your mom ever trim your toenails?".
Will replies "Not really. I just never had time, but thanks again". Will turns and runs off barefoot after taking his flops off. Wendy shakes her head as she walks off to her first class.
11123.title: Wendy hides in the next room until Brandi leaves

info.brief_description: In a private high school, even the sophomore homeroom was always in trouble.
info.description:
Chris is the sophomore class president and is at the top of his 50 sophomore classmates. He is studious, hard-working and an athlete. He does though have a wondering eye when it comes to keeping one girl. Fred was the class clown and always getting the class in trouble. He would never wear the school uniform, not wearing the correct shoes, socks or shirt or sometimes forgetting to wear socks at all.
Wendy has an eye on Chris, but his current girlfriend Brandi, never let's him out of her sight. The rest of the class is somewhat normal.

This story is about the shenanigans of a homeroom class in a private school. Almost anything goes...
